class.name: BehaviourTreeCustomActionNode
class.brief_description: A script based node for Behaviour Tree.
class.description: [BehaviourTreeCustomActionNode] will execute a custom 'Action' node behaviour-like in a GDScript environment.

method.name: _on_btnode_initialize
method.description: Called when the node was initialized by the [BehaviourTree].

method.name: _on_btnode_rewind
method.description: Called when the node was rewinded by the [BehaviourTree].

method.name: _on_btnode_enter
method.description: Called once the node enters the execution state.

method.name: _on_btnode_execute
method.description: Called when the node is still executing.

method.name: _on_btnode_exit
method.description: Called once the node finishes the execution state.

method.name: _on_btnode_serialize
method.description: Called when Behaviour Tree Runtime / Editor wants to save its nodes.

method.name: _on_btnode_deserialize
method.description: Called when Behaviour Tree Runtime / Editor wants to load its nodes.
